metadata.title: CVE-2024-32617 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: HDF5 Library through 1.14.3 contains a heap-based buffer over-read causedby the unsafe use of strdup in H5MM_xstrdup in H5MM.c (called fromH5G__ent_to_link in H5Glink.c).

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
